video_identification.title: Nyla Matuk of East Podcast in conversation with Salman Abu Sitta - 11 March 2021

extracted_metadata.title: Nyla Matuk of East Podcast in conversation with Salman Abu Sitta - 11 March 2021
extracted_metadata.description: Nyla Matuk: "I was honoured to hold a conversation with the great Salman Abu Sitta on the brilliant The East is a Podcast. He is a ground-breaking researcher and among other projects, has initiated architectural competitions that have generated detailed, practical plans for the return of Palestinian refugees to their own villages and the reconstruction of the villages, with minimal or no displacement of existing communities in Palestine. He is the Founder and President of the @PalestineLandSociety (plands.org) and the General Coordinator of the Right of Return Congress and has served as a member of the Palestine National Council. His critically acclaimed memoir Mapping my Return was published in 2016. We talked about the latest architectural competition, some of whatâ€™s in his memoir, and the history of the Nakba. Maps of Return: an interview with Dr. Salman Abu Sitta Listen here or access on any podcast browser: https://oembed.libsyn.com/embed?item_... " Podcasted on 11 March 2021
